number one spot now she found her a replacement

knowing somebodys got my baby

i shoulda put it down shoulda got that ring
cause i can still feel it in the air
see her pretty face run my fingers through her hair
my lover my life

she left me im tight
cause i knew that it just aint right

now im in the club thinkin all about my baby
hey she was so easy to love
but wait i guess that love wasnt enough

and now im missing wishing she pick up the phone
but she made a decision that she wanted to move on
cause i was wrong
